text: Woh Allah Taalaa aisa hai jiss ney aftab ko chamakta hua banaya aur chand ko noorani banaya aur uss kay liye manzilen muqarrar kin takay tum barson ki ginti aur hisab maloom ker liya kero. Allah Taalaa ney yeh cheezen bey faeeda nahi peda kin. Woh yeh dalaeel unn ko saaf saaf batla raha hai jo danish rakhtay hain
